title: Capitol punishment | Today, Explained in 10
description:
Vox’s Andrew Prokop previews the historic second impeachment trial of former President Donald Trump.

itunes:title: Capitol punishment | Today, Explained in 10
itunes:author: Vox
itunes:subtitle: In order to convict the former president, 17 Republican senators would need to vote with their Democratic colleagues. Early signs suggest that's unlikely.
